summary: x86/resctrl: Fix event counts regression in reused RMIDs
details:
x86/resctrl: Fix event counts regression in reused RMIDs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.7 by commit 07ac5db2d840e47428c871097809dc70e68f66c3, it was introduced in version v6.1 by commit 1d81d15db39c2b517bc58f63008c6255dd08aafe. For more details please see the references link.
